basics.name: Tang Qian
basics.label: Computer Science Researcher
basics.summary: A computer science researcher focused on vector search, distributed systems, and big data analysis, particularly nearest neighbor search in high-dimensional spaces

work.name: Zhejiang University
work.summary: Research on vector search, distributed systems, and big data analysis, focusing on nearest neighbor search in high-dimensional spaces.

volunteer.organization: College of Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang University
volunteer.summary: Serving as the President of Student Union for the College of Computer Science and Technology.
Serving as the Class Monitor for Software Engineering Class 6, Grade 2023.

volunteer.organization: College League Committee, Southwest Jiaotong University
volunteer.summary: Served as Deputy Secretary of the College League Committee.

volunteer.position: President of the College Student Union
volunteer.summary: Served as President of the College Student Union.
Served as the Class Monitor for Computer Science Class 1, Grade 2019.

publications.name: DIMS: Distributed Index for Similarity Search in Metric Spaces
publications.publisher: IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE)
publications.summary: A research paper on distributed indexing techniques for efficient similarity search in metric spaces, accepted by the IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering journal for 2025 publication.

publications.name: QBase: A Query Aware Vector Search System
publications.publisher: IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE)
publications.summary: A paper presenting QBase, a query-aware vector search system designed to enhance performance and efficiency in vector database operations, to appear in TKDE 2026.

publications.name: Spatio-Temporal Latent Graph Structure Learning for Traffic Forecasting
publications.publisher: International Joint Conference on Neural Networks (IJCNN 2022)
publications.summary: A conference paper exploring novel graph structure learning techniques for traffic forecasting, incorporating both spatial and temporal dimensions.

projects.name: High-Dimensional Data Retrieval Systems
projects.summary: Research project exploring approximation algorithms to improve query throughput in distributed nearest neighbor search, developing techniques to handle data skew and load balancing in graph-based distributed indexes, and conducting benchmark evaluation against state-of-the-art vector search systems.

projects.name: Distributed Indexing for Metric Space
projects.summary: Designed and implemented a scalable distributed architecture using Spark for processing large-scale metric datasets, optimized data partitioning algorithms to reduce network communication overhead by 40% while maintaining search accuracy, and conducted extensive experimental evaluation.

projects.name: Multi-Modal Data Similarity Search Framework
projects.summary: Developed a distributed framework for multi-modal data similarity search supporting efficient querying across heterogeneous data types, designed a dual-layer indexing strategy, implemented a lightweight weight learning model, and achieved significant performance improvements over state-of-the-art solutions.

projects.name: QBase: A Query Aware Vector Database System
projects.summary: Development of QBase, an innovative query-aware vector database system designed to optimize vector search with dynamic query optimization, implementing cost-based query planning algorithms to adaptively select optimal index structures.

projects.name: Graph-based Traffic Analysis Platform
projects.summary: Built data preprocessing pipeline for cleaning and normalizing traffic sensor data from multiple urban sources, implemented spatio-temporal graph neural network models, and designed interactive visualization dashboard to present traffic patterns and prediction results.
